spec_data.Name: libtermkey
spec_data.Description:
This library allows easy processing of keyboard entry from terminal-based
programs. It handles all the necessary logic to recognise special keys, UTF-8
combining, and so on, with a simple interface.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 08 Nov 2017 05:09:17 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library for easy processing of keyboard entry from terminal-based programs
